name: Matsuri Mecha
description:
The Matsuri Mecha is a Demo game made using only free (as of 4-8-2018) Unity Asset Store Assets.

You play as the Matsuri Mecha and patrol the city. You can walk, run and fly across the city of Matsuri!

Controls:

WSAD / Arrow Keys = Move /Walk

Shift Key (While Moving) = Run

Spacebar = Jump

Mouse Look = Look Around

Right Mouse (Hold) = Enter Aim Mode

Middle Mouse (While in Aim Mode) = Switch Aim Mode Shoulder View

F Key (On Ground) = Enter Fly Mode

F Key (In Fly Mode) = Drop Down / Exit Fly Mode

Shift Key (In Fly Mode) = Fly Faster
